Package cmput301w18t09.orbid

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ItemClickListener
    Interface to be implemented by activities that utilize a Recycler view.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AddEditTaskActivity
    An activity class used to display the Requesting users Add task interface, edit task interface, and bidded task interface
    AddReviewActivity
    Allows a user to provide a review to some other user only after they have completed a task interaction with one another.
    Bid
    A model representation of a bid made on a given task.
    BidListAdapter
    Binds the bid view holder with the recycler view bid list
    BidViewHolder
    Inflates the card for a bid in the recycler view Created by aidankosik on 2018-03-03.
    BuildConfig  
    CreateAccountActivity
    Allows a user register an account with the server to use the application
    DataManager
    Handles all communication between the application and the server
    DataManager.addTasks
    Inserts new tasks into the database
    DataManager.addUsers
    Inserts new Users into the database
    DataManager.deleteTasks
    Deletes tasks from the database
    DataManager.deleteUsers
    Deletes users from the database
    DataManager.getTasks
    Gets a list of tasks based on the search parameters
    DataManager.getUsers
    Gets a list of users based on the search parameters
    DataManager.NotificationChecker  
    DataManager.updateTaskNoID
    Updates a task when it has no ID.
    DataManager.updateTasks
    updates tasks in the database
    DataManager.updateUsers
    updates users in the database
    EditProfileActivity
    Allows the user to edit the information in their own profile (except username).
    FullScreenImageActivity
    Shows a clicked image in a larger view by scaling it to the available screen size
    ImageViewAdapter
    Adapter class for the Recycler view to display images
    ListReviewActivity
    Allows a user to see the list of reviews and ratings for any other user that has reviews.
    ListTaskActivity
    An activity class used to list the requestor/bidders tasks; It will list tasks for requestors, sorted by Requested, Bidded, Assigned and Completed.
    LoginActivity  
    Manifest  
    Manifest.permission  
    MapActivity
    Uses a google maps API to view some area/location of the planet
    NavigationActivity
    The navigation drawer that is seen as the main menu across most activities for ease of use -- a superclass to all other activities that feature the menu.

    RecentListingsActivity
    The main screen of the application shown post-login.
    Review
    A model representation of a review made for a user.
    ReviewListAdapter  
    ReviewViewHolder  
    Task
    A model representation of a task made by a task provider and to be completed by a task provider.
    TaskDetailsActivity
    Activity Class that lists the details of all the recent listings Tasks, as well as Assigned and Completed tasks in My Requests.
    TaskListAdapter
    Binds the task view holder with the recycler view task list
    TaskViewHolder
    Inflates the card for a task in the recycler view Created by aidankosik on 2018-03-01.
    User
    A model representation of a user of the application (requester or provider).
    UserProfileDialog
    The dialog shown when a username is clicked anywhere in the application -- shows all information pertaining to the user that was clicked.
